generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including dashed lines and a bicycle lane symbol, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, clearly separated from the road by curbs and used by pedestrians.
- building: Several buildings are visible, including a tall building with "HOTEL CONTINENTAL" signage on the right and other office-style buildings on the left and in the background.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sidewalks and in front of the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Several people are visible, including pedestrians on the sidewalk and one person standing next to a parked car on the left.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the side of the road and others are driving in the lane ahead.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including "TAXI" signs, parking signs, and a "Einbahn" (one-way) sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the image, near the sidewalk.
